title: Best deal in town! Don't miss out on this amazing 2 bed, 2 bath!
posting_body: ['Tara Bridge Apartments', '1 Magnolia Circle', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'A wonderful home in Jonesboro is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 bathroom renting for $1492 per month.', 'This unit comes with 1000 sq ft.', 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management, our lovely community offers 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments with beautiful features.', 'Residents of this gated community enjoy the wonderful amenities we provide in each our units such as private patios, wood burning fireplaces, washers and dryers hookups in all units, luxury style flooring, and spacious floor plans.', 'A perfect home for everyone, featuring a roommate-style floor plan and TONS of living space.', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Playground', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Close to I-75 / Easy Access to Hartsfield Airport,Military Bases & Shopping', '◾ Controlled Building Access', '◾ Gorgeous Pool', '◾ Online Services', '◾', 'On-Site Professional Staff', '◾ Picnic Areas with BBQ Grills', 'Unit Highlights:', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Oven', '◾ Range', '◾ Refrigerator/Freezer', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Window Coverings', '◾ Additional Storage', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ Neutral Palette Accomodates All Styles', '◾ Private Patio and Balcony', '◾ Sunny Apartment Homes / Fireplaces in Select Homes', '◾ Trash Compactor', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '63BD924C44C2489']
